_header: Now hear this pistle I you pray
Title(s): ‘De epistola domini nostri ihesu Christi de die dominica’
_description: John Audelay, ‘De epistola domini nostri ihesu Christi de die dominica’ — sixteen 13-line stanzas

BodDou302.First Lines:
Now here þis pistil I ȝou prayffore crist hit wrot with
                    his oun hond…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…Prays fore me þat beþ presentMy name hit is þe
                    blynd awdlay
BodDou302.Attributed Title:
De Epistola domini nostri ihesu christi de die dominica (f.
                        16rb)
